name: Tiffany Rollandi
bio: I am a Software Engineer who is very passionate about helping the public through creating innovative applications that will impact others in a positive and valuable way. With my previous work experiences, I have learned compassion, teamwork, effective communication/ listening and accountability. My goal is to contribute my skills and expertise to a company that shares my vision of solving diverse problems and making a difference in the lives of others. By working for an organization that is dedicated to helping the public, I aim to channel my passion into creating impactful solutions that address real-world challenges.
